titles.title: A bill to correct an error in the enrollment of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2010.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 3/10/2010--Introduced. Makes a technical correction in the enrollment of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2010 with respect to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation (Amtrak) report to Congress on Amtrak's proposed guidance and procedures necessary for it to implement a new checked firearms program. Requires the scope of such guidance and procedures to include any other measures needed to ensure the safety and security of Amtrak employees, passengers, and infrastructure, including: (1) requiring inspections of any container that carries a firearm or ammunition; and (2) the temporary suspension of firearm carriage service if credible intelligence information indicates a threat related to the national rail system or specific routes or trains.
